name: Chopped Baked Clams
author: WAYNE14
summary: While working at a restaurant, I needed a better recipe for baked clams. This is the what I devised. They went over very well. This can also be used as a spread on crackers.
ingredients: 1 (6.5 ounce) can minced clams, with juice
directions: Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C)
Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat
Cook onion in heated oil for 2 to 3 minutes
Add garlic and cook for 1 to 2 minutes more, making sure not to brown the garlic
Stir in the clams, thyme, and oregano
Remove from heat and stir in the beaten egg
Once combined, mix in breadcrumbs and spoon mixture into 4 ramekins; arrange on a baking sheet
Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes
